amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding to the STARBASE Youth Program by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Army by $3 million and to inrease by $5 million and then reduce by $3 million, the funding level for Operation and Maintenance,Defense-Wide.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 237 (Roll no. 334).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 237 (Roll no. 334).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
